## Who am I?

My name is Karsten Maurer.  I am originally from the Twin Cities area of Minnesota. I am currently an assistant professor of statistics at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. I completed my doctoral degree in statistics at Iowa State University. My research interests are in the fields of statistics education and statistical graphics.
